node.html: A customizable white-label mobile and web application that enables companies to create guided digital tours of their properties and view them in interactive 3D. Designed for facility management and real-estate workflows .

A web app that processes emails and PDF attachments across multiple Microsoft 365 mailboxes. Attachments are stored in Azure Blob Storage and passed to OpenAI GPT and Azure Document Intelligence for structured data extraction using enforced JSON schemas. Built with Logic Apps and direct file handling for scalability and high-accuracy OCR + AI processing.

A secure, touch-free check-in system where factory employees register and verify their identity using facial recognition. Built with Azure Face API and cloud storage, the system reliably authenticates employees, records attendance in real time, and streamlines workforce tracking without manual intervention.

A compact IoT device designed to automatically detect motorcycle accidents and alert emergency contacts with real-time location data.

Built with MEMS tilt sensing, GSM communication, and cloud integration, and was published as an IEEE conference paper

An IoT device deployed across buildings to continuously measure structural tilt and identify areas requiring maintenance or repair. The system uses MEMS sensors and wireless connectivity to send real-time tilt data to a cloud dashboard, enabling early detection of dangerous structural shifts and helping facility teams take preventive action.
